Interface UserDAO

    • Method Detail

      • get

        User get(int id)
        Returns a User object representing the user with the provided id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the User object to return.
        Returns:
        The User object representing the user with the provided id. Returns null if the provided id doesn't match a user in the database.

      • getFromUsername

        User getFromUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a User object representing the user with the provided username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the User object to return.
        Returns:
        The User object representing the user with the provided username. Returns null if the provided username doesn't match a user in the database.

      • getFromEmail

        User getFromEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Retrieves the user with the provided email.
        Parameters:
        email - The email of the user to return.
        Returns:
        The user with the provided email.

      • get

        java.util.List<User> get()
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a list of all the users in the database.
        Returns:
        A list of all the users in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • create

        User create(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String password)
     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a new user in the database using the provided information.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to create.
        email - The email of the user to create.
        password - The password of the user to create.
        Returns:
        An User object representing the newly created user record.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • create

        User create(java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String password,
            int balance,
            User.Role role)
     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a new user in the database using the provided information.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to create.
        email - The email address of the user to create.
        password - The password (hashed) of the user to create.
        balance - The initial balance of the user to create.
        role - The role of the user to create.
        Returns:
        A User entity representing the newly inserted user.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • update

        User update(int id,
            java.lang.String username,
            java.lang.String email,
            java.lang.String password,
            int balance,
            User.Role role)
     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates the user with the provided id using the provided information.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user to update.
        username - The username to update to.
        email - The email to update to.
        password - The password to update to.
        balance - The balance to update to.
        role - The role to update to.
        Returns:
        A User entity representing the updated user.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • delete

        boolean delete(int id)
        Deletes the user with the provided id from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the user to delete from the database.
        Returns:
        true if the user record was deleted, false if the user record was not deleted.

      • delete

        default boolean delete(User user)
